data.actual_result: It's using the other "JOINED" string, which is used in the context of joined voice channels, causing weird translations like "Connecté" in French meaning  "Connected [to voice channel]".
data.expected_result: I checked Crowdin and there are two strings that say "JOINED". It should be using the one adapted to server invite context.
data.short_description: When looking at an invite embed to a server you're already in, the wrong string is used for the "JOINED" text
data.steps_to_repro: - Find an invite embed to a server you're already in - If your language is set to English, you should be seeing "JOINED" inside the button - Now switch to a different language, in my case French
